Binary

 What is Binary ? Binary is a base 2 number system invented by

What is Binary ? Binary is a base 2 number system invented by Gottfried Leibniz that is made up of only two numbers: 0 and 1. This number system is the basis for all binary code, which is used to write data such as the computer processor instructions used every day.
